queries.name: 5aHL
queries.title: 5aHL
queries.description:
The first 2 links draw on the complete set of digitised doctoral and MPhil metadata at LSE from 1926-2021. 

* LSE doctoral theses 1926-2021 with author links to Wikipedia pages where available * Chains of doctoral students/advisors in the project (as of August 2022 the longest is 4)

queries.name: 5b4L
queries.title: 5b4L
queries.description: All the visualisations below link LSE thesis metadata with other data available in Wikidata, and so are not necessarily complete datasets.  Wikidata evolves continually and so these datasets will change over time - please re-visit periodically to see if further relationships and connections have been exposed! * Relationships between thesis supervisors and authors.

queries.name: 5WYp
queries.title: 5WYp
queries.description:
Extends beyond LSE's digitised theses by drawing on Wikidata statements for people educated at or employed by LSE with a doctoral student/supervisor relationship. This is such a large dataset it will be a little slow to open
* Relationships between notable thesis authors and supervisors where both have a Wikipedia page. Shown in list format

queries.name: 63Jh
queries.title: 63Jh
queries.description: and in graph format

queries.name: 5aTp
queries.title: 5aTp
queries.description:
* Histropedia timeline of people who are part of the LSEThesisProject, where birth date is available 

* Histropedia timeline of theses by year  Because all the theses have the same date, results are stacked for each year, and it is less easy to see individual titles, but the timeline is a good way to see how many theses are available for each year, and to see titles for pre 1990 theses

* Try using the EntiTree tool and selecting doctoral student to see visualisations of student/supervisor relationships. The longest chain we have found so far dates back to the 1500s!* An experimental query listing works cited by LSE theses. This is not metadata we hold, but Wikidata may make some interesting connections for us - as of May 2023 there are 5 results!

queries.name: 5ckW
queries.title: 5ckW
queries.description: * Similarly this experimental query looks for connections Wikidata could make, this time seeking works citing an LSE thesis - as of September 2022 we have our first 16 results!

queries.name: 5eTJ
queries.title: 5eTJ

queries.name: 5d55
queries.title: 5d55
queries.description:
The  Wikidata Thesis Toolkit, has been co-authored by LSE and the University of York to reduce the development burden for other universities wanting to carry out a Wikidata thesis project.  

We have had lots of discussion with the  New Zealand Thesis Project and this query shows items on the focus list of both our projects.  

We are also aware of thesis projects at 
*  Stanford University
*  Texas A&M University Libraries
*  University of Washington
*  Oxford University

queries.name: jwZ
queries.title: jwZ
queries.description:
* SourceMetaData thesis by institution dashboard
* Count of doctoral theses by institution * LSEThesisProject represented on Scholia https://scholia.toolforge.org/wikiproject/Q112895606

queries.name: 5bgK
queries.title: 5bgK
queries.description: * This query will show any missing reciprocal links between doctoral students and advisors As of September 2022 all students and supervisors are linked, but if any duplicate records are merged, the links need to be re-created, so this query should be periodically checked to maintain data quality
